title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Modern AlgebraThe structure of ring, Wedderburn Ã¢ÂÂArtin Theorem, Jacobson radical, prime and semi-prime rings, structure of primitive ring , density theorem, division ring, tensor product and polynomials over division ring, order division ring, local and semi local ring, Idempotent and decomposition perfect and semi perfect rings and homological characterizations.
